tidyList.title: Check if an array is empty
Compare two arrays regardless of order
tidyList.codebox:
x = [2,4,5,7,1]
y = [1,2,4,5,7]
if set(x) == set(y):
    print("true")
#output: true

tidyList.title: Compare two arrays
tidyList.codebox:
x = [2,4,5,7,1]
y = [1,2,4,5,7]
if x == y:
    print("true")
#output: true

tidyList.title: Check if an array contains a value matching some criterias
